ygData.subject: Help on factions?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello. I am eloric Necromancer of the 2nd Rank. When I obtain the 3rd Rank I am planning to venture out from my homeland. However, Being a worshipper of
ygData.messageBody:
Hello.

I am eloric Necromancer of the 2nd Rank. When I obtain the 3rd Rank I am
planning to venture out from my homeland. However, Being a worshipper of
Innoruke (sp) and being a dark elf and a necromancer give me large negative
standing with most peoples of the world.

Can anyone tell me if this is possible to overcome and to what degree? IE.
Can I complete overcome this by killing things and getting the faction
adjustments or is there a cap. For example will I always be hated by the
north freeport paladins even if I kill 100s of corrupt guards?

Has any fellow dark elf necromancers had any success with raising their
faction to an acceptable level outside of home? If so which groups?

Thanks for the help.

Eloric



... Thanks Kenneth

Kenneth E. Murphy, OCP
Research Associate - Oracle Database Administrator
OSEDA (Office of Social & Economic Data Analysis)
University Outreach & Extension
University of Missouri - Columbia
